mapper.select: select orderno, userID, orderdate, ordercnt, orderpayyn, orderamount from tb_order where userID= #{userID} and orderdate between #{fromdate} and #{todate} order by orderdate desc LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT PDALL.oddtno, PDALL.orderno, PDALL.oddtdate, PDALL.oddtcnt, PDALL.oddtreqyn, PDALL.oddtrecnt, PDALL.oddtrtnyn, PDALL.pdcode, PDALL.pdmdno, PDALL.pdno, PDALL.pdcodenm, PDALL.pdmdnm, PDALL.pdmdcop, PDALL.pdmdprice, DV.delstate from tb_delivery DV inner join (select ODD.oddtno, ODD.orderno, ODD.oddtdate, ODD.oddtcnt, ODD.oddtrecnt, ODD.oddtreqyn, ODD.oddtrtnyn, ODD.pdcode, ODD.pdmdno, ODD.pdno, IPDALL.pdcodenm, IPDALL.pdmdnm, IPDALL.pdmdcop, IPDALL.pdmdprice from tb_orderdetail ODD inner join (SELECT PC.pdcode, PC.pdcodenm, PD.pdmdno, PM.pdmdnm, PM.pdmdcop, PM.pdmdprice, PM.pdmdregdate, PD.pdno, PD.pdnm, PD.pdinfo FROM tb_pddetail PD inner join tb_pdmodel PM on PM.pdmdno = PD.pdmdno AND PM.pdcode = PD.pdcode inner join tb_pdcategory PC on PM.pdcode = PC.pdcode) IPDALL on ODD.pdno = IPDALL.pdno) PDALL on DV.delio = PDALL.orderno and DV.deliono = PDALL.oddtno where PDALL.orderno = #{orderno} order by PDALL.oddtdate desc LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) from tb_delivery DV inner join (select ODD.oddtno, ODD.orderno, ODD.oddtdate, ODD.oddtcnt, ODD.oddtreqyn, ODD.oddtrtnyn, ODD.pdcode, ODD.pdmdno, ODD.pdno, IPDALL.pdcodenm, IPDALL.pdmdnm, IPDALL.pdmdcop, IPDALL.pdmdprice from tb_orderdetail ODD inner join (SELECT PC.pdcode, PC.pdcodenm, PD.pdmdno, PM.pdmdnm, PM.pdmdcop, PM.pdmdprice, PM.pdmdregdate, PD.pdno, PD.pdnm, PD.pdinfo FROM tb_pddetail PD inner join tb_pdmodel PM on PM.pdmdno = PD.pdmdno AND PM.pdcode = PD.pdcode inner join tb_pdcategory PC on PM.pdcode = PC.pdcode) IPDALL on ODD.pdno = IPDALL.pdno) PDALL on DV.delio = PDALL.orderno and DV.deliono = PDALL.oddtno where PDALL.orderno = #{orderno}
